definition: soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
Tongariro, volcanic area on North Island, New Zealand

sentences.english: Back at Tongariro National Park, it has not been all good news.
sentences.chinese: 再回到湯加里羅國家公園，也不完全是好消息。

sentences.english: Conclusion: Bazhen Decoction have the function to improve SLE patients' the number of erythrocytes in stable.
sentences.chinese: 結論八珍湯加減能改善穩定期SLE的紅細胞數。

sentences.english: Methods To treat menopausal syndrome patients with Anshun syrup.
sentences.chinese: 方法用更年順安湯加減治療更年期綜合症。

sentences.english: Pranayama forms the foundation for the internal cleansing practices of Ashtanga yoga.
sentences.chinese: 調息法形成阿斯湯加瑜伽內心清潔習練的基礎。

sentences.english: Ashtanga yoga mats have good traction and durability.
sentences.chinese: 阿斯湯加瑜伽墊具有良好的牽引力和耐用性。

sentences.english: To observe clinical cure effect of revised Yijing Decoction treating deficient menopause.
sentences.chinese: 觀察益經湯加減治療虛性閉經的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Objective to evaluate the clinical effect of Longdan Xiegan decoction modified fast treating sudden-onset herpes zoster.
sentences.chinese: 目的臨牀龍膽瀉肝湯加減速治帶狀皰疹的療效。

sentences.english: Its closest neighbours to the north are New Caledonia, Fiji and Tonga.
sentences.chinese: 其最接近的北方鄰國新喀里多尼亞，斐濟和湯加。

sentences.english: Conclusion This therapy with ESED is effective on chronic hypertrophic laryngitis.
sentences.chinese: 結論會厭逐瘀湯加味治療慢性肥厚性喉炎有確切療效。

sentences.english: On Tonga, “newly arrived” Chinese own almost 70 percent of small businesses.
sentences.chinese: 在湯加，“新來的”中國人幾乎擁有70%的小企業。

sentences.english: It indicated that Modified Prepared Gancao Decoction had good effects in treating viral myocarditis.
sentences.chinese: 提示炙甘草湯加味治療病毒性心肌炎有較好療效。

sentences.english: Study of Jiangni tang on gastrointestinal reaction during radiotherapy of nasopharyngeal carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 降逆湯加減治療鼻咽癌放療所致胃腸副反應的研究。

cicada slough/fig. to free oneself/to extricate oneself from
